name: activator
description: Designate a custom activator when the activator slot is not used. String can be any valid querySelector and Object can be any valid Node.

name: attach
description: Specifies which DOM element that this component should detach to.String can be any valid querySelector and Object can be any valid Node. This will attach to the root v-app component by default.

name: content-class
description: Applies a custom class to the detached element. This is useful because the content is moved to the beginning of the v-app component (unless the attach prop is provided) and is not targettable by classes passed directly on the component.

name: dark
description: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for dark themes.

name: disabled
description: Disables the ability to open the component.

name: eager
description: Will force the components content to render on mounted. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.

name: full-width
description: Forces the dialog to expand 100% of available width.

name: fullscreen
description: Changes layout for fullscreen display.

name: hide-overlay
description: Hides the display of the overlay.

name: inset
description: Reduces the sheet content maximum width to 70%.

name: internal-activator
description: Designates whether the supplied activator prop is inside the component.

name: light
description: Applies the light theme variant to the component.

name: max-width
description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

name: no-click-animation
description: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of a v-dialog's content when using the persistent prop.

name: open-on-hover
description: Designates whether component should activate when its activator is hovered.

name: origin
description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation for transition origin.

name: persistent
description: Clicking outside of the element will not deactivate it.

name: scrollable
description: When set to true, expects a v-card and a v-card-text component with a designated height. For more information, check out the scrollabe example.

name: transition
description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the built in transitions or one your own.

name: value
description: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.

name: width
description: Sets the width for the component.
